# `fmt` for [conversions](/commands/categories/conversions.md)

<div class='command-title'>Format a number.</div>

## Signature

```> fmt {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input  | output |
| ------ | ------ |
| number | record |

## Examples

Get a record containing multiple formats for the number 42
```nu
> 42 | fmt
╭──────────┬──────────╮
│ binary   │ 0b101010 │
│ debug    │ 42       │
│ display  │ 42       │
│ lowerexp │ 4.2e1    │
│ lowerhex │ 0x2a     │
│ octal    │ 0o52     │
│ upperexp │ 4.2E1    │
│ upperhex │ 0x2A     │
╰──────────┴──────────╯
```
